title-group.article-title: RETRACTION: Fracture‐Related Wound Infections Following Surgical Treatment of Fractures in HIV‐Positive and HIV‐Negative Patients: A Meta‐Analysis

permissions.copyright-statement: © 2025 The Author(s). International Wound Journal published by Medicalhelplines.com Inc and John Wiley & Sons Ltd.

license.license-p: This is an open access article under the terms of the http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/ License, which permits use, distribution and reproduction in any medium, provided the original work is properly cited.

p.mixed-citation:
RETRACTION:
ChenH. , ZhuY. , and ChenQ. , “Fracture‐Related Wound Infections Following Surgical Treatment of Fractures in HIV‐Positive and HIV‐Negative Patients: A Meta‐Analysis,” International Wound Journal 21, no. 1 (2024): e14336, 10.1111/iwj.14336.37705307

abstract.p: The above article, published online on 13 September 2023, in Wiley Online Library (http://onlinelibrary.wiley.com/), has been retracted by agreement between the journal Editor in Chief, Professor Keith Harding; and John Wiley & Sons Ltd. Following an investigation by the publisher, all parties have concluded that this article was accepted solely on the basis of a compromised peer review process. The editors have therefore decided to retract the article. The authors did not respond to our notice regarding the retraction.

body.p: The above article, published online on 13 September 2023, in Wiley Online Library (http://onlinelibrary.wiley.com/), has been retracted by agreement between the journal Editor in Chief, Professor Keith Harding; and John Wiley & Sons Ltd. Following an investigation by the publisher, all parties have concluded that this article was accepted solely on the basis of a compromised peer review process. The editors have therefore decided to retract the article. The authors did not respond to our notice regarding the retraction.
